parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.92</value></part><part><name>Game Version </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects </name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>  </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Execution ("server" or empty)</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Weapons </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets a guided munition target position. The munition must have <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>manualControl</value></part></template> config to use this command. The target position has to be inside configured missile targeting cone for command to work.</value></part><part><name>Description</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> munition [[setMissileTargetPos]] position </value></part><part><name>Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> munition: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> position: [[PositionAGL]] 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>Return Value</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>missile1 [[setMissileTargetPos]] [[unitAimPosition]] tank1;</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_missile = [[createVehicle]] ["M_Scalpel_AT",([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,0,100]),[],0,"CAN_COLLIDE"];
_missile [[setMissileTargetPos]] ([[player]] [[modelToWorld]] [0,100,0]);</code> </value></part><part><name>Example 2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[missileTargetPos]] [[setMissileTarget]] [[missileTarget]] </value></part><part><name>See Also</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>

[[Category:Scripting Commands Arma 3|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands|<template><title>uc:<template><title>PAGENAME</title></template></title></template>]]

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 13, 2020 - 06:04 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:benargee|benargee]]</dt>
<dd class="note">To get list of compatible missiles with <template><title>Inline code</title><part><name index="1"/><value>manualControl</value></part></template> = 1, use the below script and paste the clipboard results to a text editor.
<code>cfgCount = [[count]] ([[configfile]] >> "CfgAmmo");
pasteStr = "";

[[for]] "_x" [[from]] 0 [[to]] (cfgCount - 1) [[do]] {
	_cfg = (configfile >> "CfgAmmo") [[select]] _x;
	_ammoClassName = [[configName]] _cfg;
	manCtrl = [[getNumber]] (configfile >> "CfgAmmo" >> _ammoClassName >> "manualControl");
	[[if]] (manCtrl > 0) [[then]] {
			pasteStr = pasteStr + _ammoClassName + [[endl]];
	};
};

[[copyToClipboard]] pasteStr;</code></dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
